nodes.text: Darth Zhorrid, a Sith Lord of the Sith Empire, owned an estate on the planet Dromund Kaas, the Empire's capital. Zhorrid spent her free time at her estates on Dromund Kaas as well as the planets Sernpidal and Begeren, where she indulged in a variety of luxuries and horrors until she was sent elsewhere by her father Darth Jadus.
Darth Zhorrid's estates were first mentioned in the Codex entry for the Sith Lord in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
